entities.name: aberforth
entities.description: Aberforth is Harry's uncle and a wizard who lives in the Burrow. He has eyes that are extraordinarily like his brother's (James Potter).

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is Aberforth's nephew and a student at Hogwarts. He is trying to get into Hogwarts with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is Harry's friend and a student at Hogwarts. He is trying to get into Hogwarts with Harry.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is a school for wizards and witches where Harry and Ron are students.

relationships.description: Aberforth has a connection to Hogwarts, as he mentions the old secret passageways.
